Class Pokemon

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Battle
          Pokemon

public class Pokemon
extends Battle

The Pokemon class, to allow adding of a Pokemon object in the BattleWorld.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Hillier

Pokemon

public Pokemon(int inCurrentPokemon,
               java.lang.String inName,
               int inLevel,
               boolean inGender,
               int inCurrentHealth,
               int inExperience,
               boolean inIsPlayers)
Constructs a new Pokemon.

Parameters:
inCurrentPokemon - A counter for which Pokemon is in play.
inName - The Pokemon's name.
inLevel - The Pokemon's level.
inGender - The Pokemon's gender.
inCurrentHealth - The Pokemon's current health.
inExperience - The Pokemon's current experience.
inIsPlayers - Whether the Pokemon is the player's or not.
Method Detail

act

public void act()
The act method for the Pokemon. This does:

-Removes the Pokemon when it has no health.

-AI for enemy Pokemon.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor
